attributes.action: CHANGE THE LAW to guarantee the outcome of any EU IN/OUT referendum is legally binding on all public administration bodies.
attributes.additional_details:
What we want you to do is in upper case lettering above.  You seem, so often, to be unable to identify what it is we want you to do.  We hope this is helpful.

Our current crop of elected representatives, who are convinced they know what is best for us, must NEVER be assumed to be above criminal manipulation for their own political benefit at every level of public administration in this country.  We need legislation in place NOW to guarantee that the will of the people, as stated in any EU IN/OUT referendum, will be upheld.
